welcome_detail: We are dedicated to providing our clients with top-quality skincare services that are designed to enhance their natural beauty and boost their confidence. Our team of skilled professionals is trained in the latest skincare techniques and uses only the highest quality products to ensure the best results for our clients.
contact_summary: Ready for some facial time?  Write to us or give us a call now, we’re always happy to provide a free consultation and help out with any questions you may ask.
about: We are dedicated to providing our clients with top-quality skincare services that are designed to enhance their natural beauty and boost their confidence. Our team of skilled professionals is trained in the latest skincare techniques and uses only the highest quality products to ensure the best results for our clients.

microblading, facial treatments, and laser hair removal. Microblading is a popular technique that creates the appearance of fuller eyebrows, and our skilled technicians use the latest tools and techniques to ensure a natural-looking result. Our facial treatments are designed to address a range of skin concerns, from acne and hyperpigmentation to aging and dryness, and are customized to meet the unique needs of each client. Finally, our laser hair removal services use the latest technology to safely and effectively remove unwanted hair from virtually any part of the body.

We understand that each client is unique and has their own skincare needs and concerns. That's why we take the time to listen to our clients and work with them to develop a personalized treatment plan that will help them achieve their skincare goals. Whether you're looking to enhance your natural beauty or address specific skin concerns, we're here to help.
Thank you for choosing our clinic for your skincare needs. We look forward to helping you achieve the beautiful, healthy skin you deserve.
For more information, please call use with (718)-971-0200

service_laser: Three wavelengths are the most accepted for effective laser hair removal:

The 810 diode wavelength earned its gold standard status for a number of reasons; reliability, range of suitable patients, efficacy, and solid safety record. Yet the 755 and 1064 wavelength has advantages that earned practitioner’s loyalty. Lasers use pulsed light to target, break down, and destroy the dark pigment in hair. This is why it works so well on dark hair.Shave before getting laser hair removal.

Normally 1 treatment per month, after 6~8 treatments, After average 8 treatments,it should be able to remove 95% of the dark hair forever and it’s painless. You can see the results in 3-4 weeks after the first treatment.
The processing time depends on the size of the area, if the area is small, it should take 5 to 10 mins
service_microblading: Eye Brow $380/$450/$550 (price varies by product used)

Semi-Permanent Tattoo is a semi-permanent makeup technique that creates the appearance of natural-looking eyebrows. It involves using a handheld tool to deposit pigment into the skin in short, hair-like strokes that mimic the look of real eyebrow hairs. This is a great solution for those who have sparse, thin, or uneven eyebrows, as it creates a fuller, more defined brow that looks natural and lasts for up to two years. The process is customizable and tailored to match the client's natural brow shape and color, and typically takes around two hours to complete. After the procedure, the client may experience some minor swelling and redness, but with proper aftercare, the results are long-lasting and natural-looking.
